scripts.postbuild: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const src = path.join(__dirname, 'dist', 'view.js'); const destDir = path.join(__dirname, '..', '..', 'docs', 'view'); const dest = path.join(destDir, 'view.js'); fs.mkdirSync(destDir, { recursive: true }); fs.copyFileSync(src, dest); console.log('Copied view.js to docs/view');"
